version_description: - Gas price will be defaulted to the average price on the Ethereum network, to make sure your transactions go through. Trust let you edit gas price and gas limit on transaction confirmation page, just press Edit.

- Gas price will be defaulted to the average price on the Ethereum network, to make sure your transactions go through. Trust let you edit gas price and gas limit on transaction confirmation page, just press Edit.

- Fixed duplicate important issue
- Added Spanish and Russian localization
- Improved transaction view. Now it shows amount with a current symbol

- Fixed duplicate important issue
- Added Spanish and Russian localization
- Improved transaction view. Now it shows amount with a current symbol
We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens
We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens

Christmas gifts
- Track your tokens prices/value in real time.
- Add support for any custom token! Even we support pretty much any ERC20 token.
- Improve balance appereance.
- Settings moves into separate tab.
- Lots of small improvements

Special thanks to Christian, Igor, Roman for feedback.

Christmas gifts
- Track your tokens prices/value in real time.
- Add support for any custom token! Even we support pretty much any ERC20 token.
- Improve balance appereance.
- Settings moves into separate tab.
- Lots of small improvements

Special thanks to Christian, Igor, Roman for feedback.

So many new things
- Tokens view looks so much better now. Thanks to Oleg :)
- Multi-currency support
- Ethereum Classic support
- Ability to enable/disable specific tokens
- Moving wallets functionality into settings

So many new things
- Tokens view looks so much better now. Thanks to Oleg :)
- Multi-currency support
- Ethereum Classic support
- Ability to enable/disable specific tokens
- Moving wallets functionality into settings

- Watch any wallet on the blockchain, just add it on the import screen.
- Increased gas price and gas limits.
- You can see/type amount in your local currency.
- Improved pass-lock functionality and passcode increased to 6 digits for the security purpose.
- Improved tokens view, it looks nicer and shows name of the token as well.
- Added QR code scanner/paste on the add custom token page.
- Decreased size of the app at least 2X to get updates faster.
- Exported file would have proper name now, so it would be easier to find or remember.
- Import your private key or keystone via QR code :)

- Watch any wallet on the blockchain, just add it on the import screen.
- Increased gas price and gas limits.
- You can see/type amount in your local currency.
- Improved pass-lock functionality and passcode increased to 6 digits for the security purpose.
- Improved tokens view, it looks nicer and shows name of the token as well.
- Added QR code scanner/paste on the add custom token page.
- Decreased size of the app at least 2X to get updates faster.
- Exported file would have proper name now, so it would be easier to find or remember.
- Import your private key or keystone via QR code :)

- Use slider or manually set gas price or gas limit :)
- Transactions more stable now, handling error, failed and pending states.
- Protection screen got a lot better now!
- Show network fee in local currency on confirm and transaction details screen
- Improved auto detections of tokens.
- Improved Keystore Management to keep your wallets secure!
- Confirm your password when creating new wallet, to make sure you haven't mistyped.
- Fixed iPhone 5 users issues!

- Use slider or manually set gas price or gas limit :)
- Transactions more stable now, handling error, failed and pending states.
- Protection screen got a lot better now!
- Show network fee in local currency on confirm and transaction details screen
- Improved auto detections of tokens.
- Improved Keystore Management to keep your wallets secure!
- Confirm your password when creating new wallet, to make sure you haven't mistyped.
- Fixed iPhone 5 users issues!

- Full featured DApps Browser
- Improve lock screen, it is getting better and better
- Added QR code scanning/pasting for watch addresses
- Improved balance fetching, it is much quicker now
- Now showing symbols on the network page

- Full featured DApps Browser
- Improve lock screen, it is getting better and better
- Added QR code scanning/pasting for watch addresses
- Improved balance fetching, it is much quicker now
- Now showing symbols on the network page
We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens
We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens

- Improved Web3 compatibilities. Explore Trust Browser to learn more.
- Lock screen improved, faster to unlock.
- Remember app would get stuck in the splash screen? That should be fixed now.
- Transactions getting even more accurate now.

- Improved Web3 compatibilities. Explore Trust Browser to learn more.
- Lock screen improved, faster to unlock.
- Remember app would get stuck in the splash screen? That should be fixed now.
- Transactions getting even more accurate now.

- Send out max amount of ether or tokens, you would love it!
- Improved web3 compatibilities. Trust Browser getting better
- Export Private Key functionality. Be careful!
- Edit custom tokens
- Better appearance on iPad

- Send out max amount of ether or tokens, you would love it!
- Improved web3 compatibilities. Trust Browser getting better
- Export Private Key functionality. Be careful!
- Edit custom tokens
- Better appearance on iPad

- Tokens look so much better now! It’s been polished quite a bit.
- Improved stability and caching mechanism to keep balances/token image/price up to date.
- Detailed view for a token
- Transactions per token
- Search by the token name to easily any compatible ERC20 contract.
- Simplified wallet selection.
- Collectables (ERC721) have details view for each token. Powered by OpenSea.

Keep on exploring! Check out new dApp every day in the Browser!

- Tokens look so much better now! It’s been polished quite a bit.
- Improved stability and caching mechanism to keep balances/token image/price up to date.
- Detailed view for a token
- Transactions per token
- Search by the token name to easily any compatible ERC20 contract.
- Simplified wallet selection.
- Collectables (ERC721) have details view for each token. Powered by OpenSea.

Keep on exploring! Check out new dApp every day in the Browser!

- Improved web3 compatibilities.
- Faster token balance fetching.
- Add badge if you have any pending transactions.
- Japanese localization (ねえ).

Explore dApps in the Trust Wallet to learn something new.

- Fix navigation bar color when doing a backup
- Fix navigation bar color when doing a backup
- Fixed crash on start for small amount of users.
- Fixed crash on start for small amount of users.

- Add support for Callisto Network
- Improved handling pending transactions
- Fixed invalid sender error on iOS 10 devices.
- Adjusted layout for iPad users.
- Open all the URL in the dApp Browser
- Proper handling for navigation bar when sharing

- Improved handling pending transactions

- Simplified confirm transaction form
- Styled transaction view screen a bit
- Estimate gas is now more accurate
- Improved handling pending transactions
- Now choose DuckDuckGo or Google for default search engine in the browser
- Settings looks prettier

- Simplified confirm transaction form
- Styled transaction view screen a bit
- Estimate gas is now more accurate

Big update! Make sure to backup your wallets before the update, just in case.

It bring some breaking changes that will allow us to iterate quicker on the product to build amazing features for all of you!

- Multi-Coin - allows you to store assets from different networks, all in one.
- Foundation to add support for Bitcoin/Litecoin/EOS/NEO in the upcoming months
- Improved stability and responsiveness of the app.
- Removed support for the test networks. It was a tough decision to make.
- Improved handling for pending transactions

Big update! Make sure to backup your wallets before the update, just in case.

It bring some breaking changes that will allow us to iterate quicker on the product to build amazing features for all of you!

- Multi-Coin - allows you to store assets from different networks, all in one.
- Foundation to add support for Bitcoin/Litecoin/EOS/NEO in the upcoming months
- Improved stability and responsiveness of the app.
- Removed support for the test networks. It was a tough decision to make.
- Improved handling for pending transactions

We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens.

- Improve sending transactions
- Show balance for each wallet in the Wallets screen
- Enable Main Wallet deletion
- Show total amount after QR code is scanned

iOS version is relesed. Here is what's new:

- Wanchain, VeChain support
- Improvements to update balance when new transaction is sent
- Swipe to send token from the Wallet screen
- Requires passcode to see the backup phrase
- Options to sort by balance, token value
- Market feature to monitor token graphs and charts
- Improved web3 capabilities

Trust Wallet is the simplest and most reliable application for buying, exchanging and managing cryptocurrency. This update contains bug fixes, new features and performance improvements.

- Improved Deep Linking support
- Improved user experience for UTXO based blockchains. Now auto change address is disabled by default to avoid confusion for the new users. You can enable in Additional Settings.

The DApp browser has been removed from this and all future versions of the iOS app. Coins/tokens sent to DApps are safe; you can continue using DApps from your preferred web browser using WalletConnect. Visit community.trustwallet.com for details. Other enhancements in this version include:
- Added support for Thorchain (RUNE)
- User interface of transaction details improvements
- Improved WalletConnect connectivity

- Added support for Thorchain (RUNE)
- User interface of transaction details improvements
- Improved WalletConnect connectivity
